name: Lisaa
info: A woman decides to get her mother remarried and sets out to seek her grandparents' blessings. However, after arriving at their house, she discovers their murderous inclination and a haunting past

name: Khaki
info: Enjoy Khaki full movie here : An honest police officer finds himself transferred again and again due to his sincerity. After his latest transfer, he comes across a file that involves a gang of ruthless thieves who loot and kill along the highway.

name: all is well
info: Sending bright smiles and positive vibes your way, All is well is a talk show hosted by Suma Kanakala, where she interacts with various celebrities and maintains an entertaining tenor while highlighting all the good news from around the world.

name: honey moon
info: After consenting to an arranged marriage, Praveen and Tejaswini embark on a journey filled with unexpected events and galore of emotions, and their unplanned honeymoon turns out to be the best decision ever.
